original_title: 愛する夫の負債で闇金業者の違法な取り立てに中出し返済させられた借金妻
overview: Sakura married with small construction developer, but what she didn’t know is that the husband likes to borrow money from loan sharks… even more surprising to her is that the loan sharks want to get paid no matter how, even with pussy.
title: A Wife Who Was Made To Repay Her Beloved Husband’s Debts That He Incurred From A Black Market Dealer With Creampies – Moko Sakura
